ing: 1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "The best no bake banana pudding you will ever find (or so I've been told by many)."
ins: In a large mixing bowl, beat pudding mix and milk 2 minutes.  Blend in condensed milk until smooth.  Stir in vanilla and fold in whipped topping.  Layer wafers, bananas and pudding mixture in a glass serving bowl.  Chill until serving.
